h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Spikeshaft Staff Location
content: The Spikeshaft Staff can be found after completing Chapter 3 - The New West. Once you start Chapter 4, it can be crafted from a Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Spikeshaft_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Spikeshaft Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Spikeshaft Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Spikeshaft Staff can be found after completing Chapter 3 - The New West. Once you start Chapter 4, it can be crafted from a Shrine.
